content: than 1st point marker on the top of this point to mark it as the 2nd point 3rd point- with right sides facing slip_stitch the first seven stitches of round 13 on the current point to the last seven stitches on the 1st point do not fasten_off continue to slip_stitch the next seven stitches on the current point to the next seven stitches on the 2nd point mark as 3rd point and fasten_off 4th point- with right sides facing slip_stitch the first stitch of round 13 on the current point to the seventh stitch from the corner joining the 1st and 3rd points on the 1st point slip_stitch the next six stitches on the current point to the next six stitches on the 1st point ending at the corner joining the 1st and 3rd points do not fasten_off slip_stitch the next seven stitches on the current point to the next seven stitches on the 3rd point mark as 4th point and fasten_off 5th point- with right sides facing slip_stitch the first stitch of round 13 on the current point to the seventh stitch from the corner joining the 1st and 4th points on the 1st point slip_stitch the next six stitches on the current point to the next six stitches on the 1st point ending at the corner joining the 1st and 4th points do not fasten_off slip_stitch the next seven stitches on the current point to the next seven stitches on the 4th point mark as 5th point and fasten_off 6th point- with right sides facing slip_stitch the first stitch of round 13 on the current point to the seventh stitch from the corner joining the 1st and 2nd points slip_stitch the next six stitches on the current point to the next six stitches on the 2nd point ending at the corner joining the 1st and 2nd points do not fasten_off slip_stitch the next seven stitches on the current point to the remaining unworked stitches on the 1st point do not fasten_off slip_stitch the next seven stitches on the current point to the next seven stitches on the 5th point mark as 6th point and fasten_off 7th point- with right sides facing slip_stitch the first stitch of round 13 on the current point to the seventh stitch from the corner joining the 5th and 6th points on the 6th point slip_stitch the next six stitches on the current point to the next six stitches on the 6th point ending at the corner joining the 5th and 6th points do not fasten_off slip_stitch the next seven stitches on the current point to the next seven stitches on the 5th point mark as 7th point and fasten_off 8th point- with right sides facing slip_stitch the first stitch of round 13 on the current point to the seventh stitch from the corner joining the 5th and 7th points on the 7th point slip_stitch the next six stitches on the current point to the next six stitches on the 7th point ending at
